alert.note: Alert for Clark; Pike (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 26 at 1:11AM CDT until June 26 at 2:00AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Clark County in southwestern Arkansas... Eastern Pike County in southwestern Arkansas... * Until 200 AM CDT. * At 111 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles east of Narrows Dam, or 10 miles northeast of Murfreesboro, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Murfreesboro... Glenwood... Amity... Okolona... Daisy... Narrows Dam... Halfway... Crater Of Diamonds State Park... Daisy State Park... Delight... Antoine... Billstown... Alpine... Bear Creek Public Use Area... Burtsell... Shawmut... Rosboro... Pike City... Hollywood... Pisgah... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
